question: what are the routing protocols supported by the balance/max family?
in which situation is a captive portal applied to an ssid instead of a vlan?
choices: when deploying a captive portal to pepwave max cellular routers
when deploying a captive portal to pepwave access points only

question: the customer is interested in deploying fusionhub into the hq of the enterprise network. what is the sizing criteria to choose for the right fusionhub sku?
choices: based on the number of peers supported.
based on the amount of client devices connected to the fusionhub.
based on the hypervisor platform fusionhub is installed on.
based on the number of wan of the hq network.
correct_answers: based on the number of peers supported.

question: choose the statement(s) that correctly describe how the outbound policy rules are executed (choose two).
choices: order of processing from top to bottom
the policy always lower than pepvpn / ospf / bgp / ripv2/ speedfusion cloud routes
able to control the traffic when no connections are available
order of processing is go through all the policies then chose fitting one policy
correct_answers: order of processing from top to bottom
able to control the traffic when no connections are available

question: please select the correct statement that explains the sd-wan feature: wan virtualization.
choices: peplink routers enable you to build one logical wan connection using multiple technologies (e.g. xdsl, mpls, cellular, fiber)
using incontrol 2, network administrators gain full control over their networks using a single interface
using speedfusion vpn technology, branch offices gain secure, local network access to cloud resources
peplink routers actively monitor wan quality and makes intelligent decisions to direct application traffic flow
correct_answers: peplink routers enable you to build one logical wan connection using multiple technologies (e.g. xdsl, mpls, cellular, fiber)

question: when using pepvpn behind a firewall, one needs to open the incoming ports of:
choices: tcp port 32015 and udp port 4500 or according to either data port 'default' or 'custom' settings.
correct_answers: tcp port 32015 and udp port 4500 or according to either data port 'default' or 'custom' settings.

question: which is a possible misstep/problem that prevents speedfusion from establishing?
choices: not having the same amount of wan connections on either end of speedfusion.
same wan subnet on either end of speedfusion
same lan subnet on either end of speedfusion
not having the same model of peplink on either end of speedfusion.
correct_answers: same lan subnet on either end of speedfusion

question: for branches having the same lan network, we should allow them to configure a 'virtual' network range, which then maps this virtual network to the local network that is having conflict. so the hq site will only see the virtual network, and the conflict network will be hidden from hq. which of the features best described above statement? (choose one)
choices: recommend to change the branches lan subnet to avoid overlapping

question: when would you need to enable wan smoothing? (choose two)
choices: wan smoothing should be enabled when you establish speedfusion tunnel.
users complain the speed is slow
jitter when you do video streaming
one way audio for voip but no packet loss found
intermittently when access the e-mail server in hq.
correct_answers: jitter when you do video streaming

is a 5g wan option for other peplink or pepwave products which does not support 5g
provides a portable 5g and gps connection for windows and linux devices

question: what is the incontrol2 api request rate limit?

web admin > connection details > cellular status
web admin > connection details > cellular status > engineering data
web admin > status > modem support list
web admin / <support.cgi> page > cellular module firmware update
correct_answers: web admin > connection details > cellular status > engineering data

question:
consider this scenario: a customer has one dsl and one cellular wan connected to a balance router. she has configured both internet connections as "always on." this customer would like to use wan 2 (cellular) only for back-up or fail-over purposes.

which of the following load balancing algorithms would you recommend?

- water-proof
- no ingress of dust

which max cellular model(s) could meet the above requirements? (you may select more than one answer.)

when a new vlan is created in incontrol2, how can one apply the vlan to several selected peplink devices at once in a group?
choices: assign the vlan to the incontrol organization
assign the vlan to the incontrol group and select "apply to all devices"
assign the vlan to incontrol group with a defined "tag"
assign the vlan to each device individually
there is no such option; configure the vlan at the individual devices.
correct_answers: assign the vlan to incontrol group with a defined "tag"

question: which of the following parameters can be configured using incontrol2?
choices: outbound policies, firewall rules, ipsec vpn tunnel configuration, ssids
ssids, port forwarding, vlans, firewall rules
firmware management, outbound policies, speedfusion vpn tunnel configuration, ssids
ipsec vpn tunnel configuration, dns settings, speedfusion vpn tunnel configuration, firewall rules
correct_answers: firmware management, outbound policies, speedfusion vpn tunnel configuration, ssids

question: how can a fusionhub image be obtained?
choices: contact peplink team to send you the image.
download the latest humble bundle; fusionhub is part of any humble bundle.
download the fusionhub image from the peplink firmware & manual page.
correct_answers: download the fusionhub image from the peplink firmware & manual page.

question: how can the existing license key be transferred from one fusionhub instance to another?
choices: go to incontrol2; navigate to warranty & licenses; release the key from existing fusionhub; and import the key into the new fusionhub instance.
contact peplink support with the request; wait for the license to be released; then import the key into the new fusionhub instance.
log onto the web interface of the original fusionhub instance and release the license key; log onto the web interface of the new fusionhub instance and activate the license key.
it is not possible to transfer existing license keys.
correct_answers: go to incontrol2; navigate to warranty & licenses; release the key from existing fusionhub; and import the key into the new fusionhub instance.

question: which netflow protocols does peplink support? (choose three answers.)

choices: an antenna typically used to extend the range of a wi-fi network into hard-to-reach corners of buildings or in other specific situations where 360-degree coverage is not needed
an antenna which supports connections from multiple directions and is commonly used on wi-fi routers
correct_answers: an antenna typically used to extend the range of a wi-fi network into hard-to-reach corners of buildings or in other specific situations where 360-degree coverage is not needed

question: what is the purpose of the sim toolkit feature? (choose two answers.)

retrieve sms from the sim card

retrieve sms from the sim card

question: which of the following is not correct about the router utility app?

it can be used to remotely reboot a router.
it can be used to view the ip address of lan interface.
it can be used to check speedfusion's connectivity.
it can be used to check routers' event log.

question: in which of the following situations would the use of speedfusion tcp mode be advised?
choices: the isp is throttling port udp 4500 traffic.
cellular throughput limited by the isp.
all of the above are correct.
correct_answers: the isp is throttling port udp 4500 traffic.

question: how can you configure your device to reach incontrol 2 through a firewall?
choices: enable traffic for udp port 5246 and tcp port 443 on the peplink device
allow outbound and inbound traffic for www.peplink.com.
allow outbound and inbound traffic for ic2.peplink.com.
enable traffic for udp port 5246 and tcp port 443 on the firewall.
correct_answers: enable traffic for udp port 5246 and tcp port 443 on the firewall.

question: which statement about forward error correction is incorrect?
choices: it may be found under the wan smoothing feature.
it is of benefit in one-way communications.
it is a signal processing technique used to enhance data reliability.
it consumes less data than wan smoothing.

question: which speedfusion feature was designed for the 5g scenario?
which statement about peplink's implementation of virtual router redundancy protocol (vrrp) is correct? (you may select more than one answer.)
choices: a balance router can't inter-operate via vrrp with a cisco router.
to avoid potential firmware issues when using two hd2 routers it is recommended the master has the current firmware version and the slave be one version behind.
vrrp is a generic specification which peplink has extended to provide additional functionality if certain criteria are met.
peplink recommends when using vrrp the two devices be identical.
peplink routers cannot perform configuration synchronization while operating in ha mode.
a unique feature of peplink's implementation is ha is compatible with drop-in mode.
correct_answers: vrrp is a generic specification which peplink has extended to provide additional functionality if certain criteria are met.
peplink recommends when using vrrp the two devices be identical.

question: an enterprise network administrator wishes to support seamless voip over wi-fi client devices. what feature of the aps can be turned on to facilitate this and where does one find this setting?
choices: ap > wireless ssid > ssid settings > broadcast ssid
ap > wireless ssid > security settings > fast transition
ap > wireless ssid > ssid settings > click on the (?) mark to unhide the ssid advance settings > fast roaming
ap > ap controller > sync. method > as soon as possible
ap > profiles > ap controller settings > client load balancing
correct_answers: ap > wireless ssid > security settings > fast transition

how many ap one flex devices are needed for the following situation?

choices: not sure; need to do a site survey.

users complain the speed is slow.

one way audio is in use for voip and no packet loss found.
connections in accessing the e-mail server in hq are intermittent.
correct_answers: the users see glitches over video streaming sessions.

question: in incontrol, how can you assign different users to manage individual groups within an organization, such that each user id can only view and manage devices within their designated group?
choices: assign user role as organization administrator
assign user role as organization viewer
assign user role as dashboard viewer
assign user role as group administrator
assign user role as group viewer
correct_answers: assign user role as group administrator

question: a device which is not managed under the same organization or not managed by incontrol can be added to a star and point-to-point topology profile by its site id. is this true or false?
when do you want to enable the cellular settings > optimal network discovery feature?
choices: to have the cellular module check for the best connection when it first tries to establish a cellular connection after the module is reset
to have the cellular module check for a better connection after having failed to 3g for a defined time even though this will interupt connectivity for a short time
to have the cellular module check for the best connection after the router is rebooted
to have the cellular module check for a better connection after having failed to 3g only once there is no active data traffic
to have the cellular module check for an ltea connection after having been connected to lte for a defined time
correct_answers: to have the cellular module check for a better connection after having failed to 3g for a defined time even though this will interupt connectivity for a short time

question: which statement best describes private ip?
choices: a private ip can be routed across the internet.
users need to contact the isp to obtain a private ip for their internal usage.
a private ip supports duplicate ip addresses in same network.
a network with private ips requires an nat gateway for internet access.
correct_answers: a network with private ips requires an nat gateway for internet access.

question: what power option is required in order to enable poe output on a max hd4? (select two answers)
choices: use a 56v power supply and change the dip switch settings on the router to enable poe.

question: your customer explains while her organization would like to use speedfusion but they are prohibited by regulation and policy from using third party services such as incontrol. are there any alternatives which could be presented to this customer?
choices: yes. fusionhub could be used with aws or azure.
yes. fusionhub cold be used with aws or azure.
yes. fusionhub with microsoft dynamics would meet the customer's requirement.
yes. the customer can host it's own speedfusion-capable router within its own data center.
correct_answers: yes. the customer can host it's own speedfusion-capable router within its own data center.

question: which is the best statement as to how routers in high availability mode communicate with each other?
choices: the routers communicate with vrrp via the wan ports
the routers use rsrp to communicate via the lan ports
the routers use vrrp to communicate either via lan or wan ports
the routers communicate with vrrp via the lan ports
the routers use rsrp to communicate via the lan ports
correct_answers: the routers communicate with vrrp via the lan ports

question: when should you use the phase 2 pfs group option on the ipsec profile configuration page?
choices: use this option when better compatibility is needed.
this option can be safely ignored.
there is no specific use of pfs.
use this option when you need a more secure vpn.
correct_answers: use this option when you need a more secure vpn.

question: when you install a max br1-lte-us with a provisioned verizon sim card, you notice in the web admin dashboard the cellular is stuck in "obtaining ip address..." what is the most likely cause of the problem? note: the same setup is working fine with other verizon sim cards.
choices: the max br1-lte-us imei has not been registered to verizon
cellular state set to standby mode
correct_answers: the max br1-lte-us imei has not been registered to verizon

question: a customer complains "when trying to configure wi-fi > security settings, i could not see the fast transition option with my security policy = wpa/wpa2 - personal." why would this be the situation?
choices: fast transition is only available with security policy = open (no encryption).
fast transition is only available with security policy = wpa3 - personal.
fast transition is only available with security policy = wpa2/wpa3 - personal.
fast transition is only available with security policy = wpa2 or wpa/wpa2 - enterprise.
fast transition is only available with security policy = wpa2 or wpa3 equivalent (personal or enterprise).
correct_answers: fast transition is only available with security policy = wpa2 or wpa3 equivalent (personal or enterprise).

choices: the incontrol2 captive portal is a web page which is displayed to newly connected users before they are granted access to the internet.

the incontrol2 captive portal is a web page that allows you to configure peplink devices.
the incontrol2 captive portal is the web page that allows you to register peplink devices for warranty purposes.
correct_answers: the incontrol2 captive portal is a web page which is displayed to newly connected users before they are granted access to the internet.

question: starting from firmware 8.0, you can configure concurrent layer 2 and layer 3 pepvpn tunnels between the same pair of pepvpn peers. which configuration tasks are wrong when doing this? (select two answers.)
choices: create maximum 5 tunnels in total (default + sub tunnels)
create maximum 6 tunnels in total (default + sub tunnels)
the layer 2 sub-tunnel bridge to the untagged lan
the layer 2 sub-tunnel bridge to a single vlan
the subnet(s) for layer 3 (routable) should be different from subnet(s) for layer 2 (bridged) tunnels.
correct_answers: create maximum 6 tunnels in total (default + sub tunnels)
